ai.summary: A short, easy 5.1 km hike along the Exeter Woollen Trail in the UK. The route is suitable for beginners and families, offering largely flat paths with light urban scenery and a touch of local woollen heritage.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths with some pavement or gravel. Occasional uneven surfaces near heritage sites or at edges of wooded sections; expect gentle gradients rather than steep climbs.
ai.safety_notes: Check the forecast and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, watch for cyclists on shared routes, and be mindful of road crossings. Carry a map or GPS, have a charged phone, and keep valuables secure.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for pleasant weather and good visibility; doable year-round with appropriate clothing and footwear.

seo.title: Exeter Woollen Trail – 5.1 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Exeter Woollen Trail, a 5.1 km easy hike in the UK. Ideal for beginners and families, featuring flat paths, light scenery, and a glimpse of woollen heritage.
seo.h1: Exeter Woollen Trail (5.1 km) – Easy UK Hike
